DOC.brief_summary: What is the best medication for hormonal stimulation in cycles with high intra-uterine insemination: tablets of Clomifen (5 days) followed by tablets of Ethinyl Estradiol (5 days) or daily injections with Human Menopausal Gonadotropin (Menopur)?
DOC.brief_title: Hormonal Stimulation in IUI Treatment: Is Clomifen Combined With Ethinyl Estradiol Better, Worse or Equal to Menopur
DOC.criteria: women younger than 42 years old infertility of at least one year normal tubal, pelvic and uterine anatomy semen with total motility count of at least 5 million (at least one sample) premature ovarian failure medical history of tubal or ovarian surgery tubal or pelvic adhesions
